price: فرمانرواییِ آسمان‌ها و زمین از آنِ الله است و الله بر هر چیزی تواناست.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
